docs.title: Prerequisites
docs.text:
• Python

    You can choose any version when generating template. Using some Python version management tools like pyenv is recommended.

  • copier

    Install copier in your python env as bellow.

    pip install copier

docs.title: Getting template
docs.text:
1. Copy template.

    copier https://github.com/moguraion/copier-study /path/to/destination

  2. Initializing template.

    cd /path/to/destination
make init

That's all!!
